topic.title: Play - Movie catalog
topic.body:
1000+ Movies with cover, trailer, details and torrent links
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp

1_1Ad65ppm6jjuP1rzFTQZRGzBHVGWk8EcyA.body:
> [glock](#comment_47_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa): Great site!

Thanks, any suggestion are welcome :)

> [zeronetuserb](#comment_1_1KwKK42htm7GpqJ8V4BKvZGXiv5GeTBcyt): is there a similar site for series ??

Not yet, but it's planned

> [hundter](#comment_1_1DNKHwuWrHEwNkwSCMWBjsT9s78MRajfLz): Are you planning to add more size options to each movie. 9Gb 1080p versions might seem a bit high to some, i understand why some people would prefer those versions though.

Currently for SD and 720p it prefer smaller sizes, for 1080p bigger sizes (up to 8GB). If you click on `source: rarbg` it lists the other versions on rarbg. (served on clearnet)
